Sant Rampal is a spiritual leader and preacher, known for his teachings on devotion to God. He was born in India in 1950 and has gained popularity through his TV programs and religious discourses. He is considered to be an incarnation of Lord Kabir, who is revered as a Hindu saint. Sant Rampal's followers believe that he is the messenger of God and the pathway to salvation.
